title: A collection of calculation methods of SES
text: basic example shows use package. Import package: Datasets pre-loaded package demo: CFPS 2010 Child PSID elderly ’re many ways calculate SES, coded make comparisons. Betan: Computation method SES proposed Betancourt, L, 2016 (Updating)
code: library(SESverse) summary(CFPS_child)  summary(PSID_elderly) betan(faminc=50000,familysize = 5,edu_m = 12,method = 'raw',data = 'CFPS') #> # A tibble: 1 x 1 #>   SES_betan_cfps #>            <dbl> #> 1            3.5 #> # A tibble: 1 x 1 #>   SES_betan_psid #>            <dbl> #> 1              2

what: Betan: Computation method of SES proposed by Betancourt, L, 2016 — betan
title: Betan: Computation method of SES proposed by Betancourt, L, 2016 — betan
text: Betan: Computation method SES proposed Betancourt, L, 2016

title: Betan: Computation method of SES proposed by Betancourt, L, 2016 — betan
code: betan(   faminc,   familysize,   itn,   edu_m,   method = "raw",   data = "CFPS",   povertyline = 12060,   increase = 4180 )

title: Betan: Computation method of SES proposed by Betancourt, L, 2016 — betan
text: faminc Family income familysize integer indicating number people household itn (Optional) income--need ratio, supplied ITN pre-calculated edu_m Mother's education method 'raw'(default) indicate calculate SES family income, education family size. 'itn' indicate calculate SES pre-calculated ITN data character indicate ‘CFPS' dataset 'PSID' povertyline used 'PSID' dataset, value, default 12060 increase used 'PSID' dataset, value, default 4180
